column5: Ive been going to an area that hold some big bass as well as some small pike.On friday I missed a few nice largies and a big ass pike.Well today I hit the area again,obviously for certain reasons.Well, that never came about! But I did luck into this little guy.A warrior amongst his peirs!With the same bait! Ive been sticking with one type of bait,and truely indeed the bite has been harder to acheive indeed!As one ofner mentioned previously! Ive tried rattlin spots,texas rigs,gulp alives as well.Only one bait and color produces fish so far!For the hungry bigger fish! Chartruese and white willow blade spinner bait!Brown and green is a hit or miss! Anyway,this is what I got for my hundreds of casts!It was a joy to release him for another fight one day!The scenery was awesome as well!
Still a fish Vince!  Get those big ones next time!
Right on Vinni Sweet reward for your efforts Leechman
Still sounds like a sweet day on the water V - and not a bad fish to add to the memory banks
Nice spot and a decent fish Vince. No water skiing instructors on that one?
hey nice report!  Looks like a lovely spot!  Nice fish!  Cheers!
